messages.content: How do I track my order?
You can track your order using the tracking link sent to your email once it's shipped.
What is your return policy?
We accept returns within 30 days of delivery. The item must be unused and in its original packaging.
Can I change my shipping address after placing an order?
Yes, but only within 2 hours of placing your order. Please contact support as soon as possible.
My order arrived damaged. What should I do?
We're sorry to hear that! Please send us a photo of the damage and your order number. We'll issue a replacement or refund.
Do you offer international shipping?
Yes, we ship to over 50 countries. Delivery times and fees vary depending on the location.
How long does standard shipping take?
Standard shipping usually takes 5–7 business days after the order is processed.
I forgot my password. How do I reset it?
Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions to reset your password.
What payment methods are accepted?
We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay.
Can I cancel my order?
Orders can be canceled within 2 hours of placing them. Please contact support immediately.
Do you offer gift wrapping?
Yes, gift wrapping is available at checkout for a small additional fee.
I ordered the wrong size. Can I exchange it?
Absolutely! You can exchange items within 30 days of delivery if they're unused.
Why is my tracking number not working?
It may take up to 24 hours for tracking info to update. Please try again later.
Can I combine multiple discount codes?
Unfortunately, only one discount code can be used per order.
Do you have physical stores?
We are currently an online-only store and do not operate physical locations.
Is there a warranty on your products?
Yes, we offer a 1-year warranty on all electronics and a 30-day satisfaction guarantee on apparel.
How do I apply a promo code?
Enter your promo code in the 'Discount Code' box during checkout and click 'Apply'.
Do I need an account to order?
No, you can check out as a guest. But creating an account gives access to order history and faster checkout.
My order says delivered but I didn’t receive it. What now?
Please check with neighbors and contact your local courier. If still unresolved, contact us for assistance.
Can I preorder an item that's out of stock?
If preorders are available, the option will appear on the product page. Otherwise, click 'Notify Me' for restock updates.
What happens if I miss the delivery?
The courier will leave a notice or try again. You can also schedule a redelivery online using the tracking link.
Can I update the email on my order?
Yes, contact support with your order number and the new email address you'd like us to use.
Do you offer bulk discounts?
Yes! For bulk orders over 10 items, please contact our sales team for special pricing.
Do you charge sales tax?
Sales tax is applied based on your shipping address and local regulations.
How do I know if my order was successful?
You’ll receive a confirmation email with your order number after placing it.
Can I use store credit with a discount code?
Yes, store credit can be used along with a single discount code at checkout.
How do I unsubscribe from emails?
You can click the 'Unsubscribe' link at the bottom of any of our marketing emails.
Do you offer same-day delivery?
Currently, same-day delivery is only available in select metro areas.
I received the wrong item. What should I do?
We're sorry! Please send us a photo of the item you received and we’ll correct the mistake quickly.
How do I use store credit?
Store credit will automatically apply at checkout if logged into your account.
Can I return an item bought on sale?
Yes, sale items can be returned unless marked 'Final Sale' on the product page.
How do I update my billing info?
Log into your account and go to 'Billing Information' to update your payment details.
Do you ship to PO boxes?
Yes, we ship to PO boxes using standard shipping.
Can I delay my shipment?
We don't offer delayed shipping options at the moment, but you can contact support to see if we can help.
Do you offer student discounts?
Yes! Verify your student status with StudentBeans to get a 10% discount.
What should I do if my payment fails?
Check your card details or try another payment method. If issues persist, contact your bank or our support team.
Are your products eco-friendly?
Many of our products are made with sustainable materials. Look for the eco-friendly badge on product pages.
Can I request a gift receipt?
Yes, choose the gift receipt option during checkout.
What is the status of my refund?
Refunds typically take 5–7 business days after we receive your return. Check your email for updates.
Do you restock sold-out items?
Yes, popular items are often restocked. Use the 'Notify Me' option to get alerts.
Can I save items to a wishlist?
Yes, just click the heart icon next to any product to save it to your wishlist.
Do you price match other stores?
We currently do not offer price matching, but keep an eye out for our frequent sales.
Can I get an invoice for my purchase?
Yes, invoices are emailed automatically or can be downloaded from your account.
What if I entered the wrong phone number?
Contact support with your order number and correct phone number. We’ll update it for you.
Do I need ID to receive my package?
No, unless you're receiving restricted items. Otherwise, no ID is required.
Can I order over the phone?
We currently only accept orders through our website.
Is my payment information secure?
Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and secure payment gateways to protect your data.
Do you offer gift cards?
Yes, we offer digital gift cards in various denominations. You can find them under the 'Gifts' section.
What should I do if I receive an expired product?
We’re sorry about that! Please send us a photo and we’ll send a replacement immediately.
How do I leave a product review?
After your purchase, you’ll receive an email invitation to leave a review.
Are there any hidden fees?
No hidden fees! All charges are shown at checkout.
